comments_since_last_sample.body: Sorta random and slightly off topic. But does anyone else think mirage could use a little buff? Nothing huge or game changing, but maybe something that enhances his kit a little. The main thing I could think of that wouldn't push him to be OP is to all him to make decoys of teammates. If anyone else has any ideas or criticisms about mine, feel free to mention it!
